By Lisa Shock on Sunday, April 22, 2001 - 01:49 pm:

Just thought you guys might be interested in seeing some fan art from Japan. A lot of it was clearly done by young children, but the cool thing is that some pics show MF3 monsters that Tecmo has not released pics of, yet. Anyway, click here to see it.
